title: 不知道是哪个插件发送的 想取消掉
author: mchappytowncc
txt_content:
QQ图片20190912111126.png (92.29 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-9-12 11:11 上传






如题 每次攻击玩家都会出现如下提示
按理论找到的插件config或其他配置里都没有看见这一行英文..
想求解到底是哪个插件发送的

replies.author: Salt_lovely
replies.txt_content:
# Should the "Anti Looter" module be enabled?
antilooter-enabled: true

# Duration in seconds to protect the loot for.
antilooter-duration: 15

# This message is displayed to the attacker once they have killed someone.
antilooter-dropped-message: "&eDropped items have been protected for &d{time}&e."
[修正|管理|信息|机械|传送]FBasics | Anti-Glitch —— 各种BUG修复！[1.7.4~1.8.1] 
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-482331-1-1.html 
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)


FBasics插件，将配置文件里面的antilooter-enabled: true改成false就行

如果你嫌烦但是不想关闭这个功能，可以试试这个插件


[优化]Console Spam Fix—— 控制台垃圾内容隐藏插件[1.7.10-1.12] 
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-699567-1-1.html 
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
FBasics 中有一句 
https://www.spigotmc.org/resourc ... -glitch-plugin.503/

antilooter-dropped-message: "&eDropped items have been protected for &d{time}&e."

replies.author: xsfcaDcsa
replies.txt_content: FBasics的 你看看他的配置
